Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Seattle to Detroit on 2/2/1988 (Going to SEA: P Greg Swindell, P Dennis Cook, P Colin Ward, C Mackey Sasser. Going to DET: P Greg Hibbard, 3B Gary Sheffield, 3B Jim Presley, LF Gorma
n Thomas, RF Tom Brunansky)...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1989, off Andy Hawkins (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1989, off Danny Jackson (KC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1990, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1990, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 9/16/1990...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 9/16/1990...
Hit for the cycle against Seattle on 5/21/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1991, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1991, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1992, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1992, hitting .346 with 6 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 7/29/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1992, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Toronto on 8/28/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1992, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1992, hitting .328 with 36 HR, 123 RBI...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $8,414,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1993, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1993, hitting .411 with 10 HR, 22 RBI...
